name: E3: Speaking

questions.question: Watch: What additional benefits of demonetization do you perceive? Give a detailed explanation of at least one. Do not include the benefits already discussed.
Watch: Based on the audio youâ€™ve just listened to, how accurate do you think is the speaker? Give your opinion on one issue.

note: Speak for about one to two minutes into the recording tool provided on the desktop on the following subject. You might want to prepare notes for a minute and get started.
